name: Central West Virginia Aging Services INC (hmkr)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Central West Virginia Aging Services INC (hmkr) is a Home Health provider based in Buckhannon, WV. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $61.8M in Medicaid payments across 287K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $61.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
